song_name: とっておきクリスマス
lyrics: とっておきMerry Christmas !(I wish you a Merry Christmas !)素敵なMerry Christmas ! Silent night !一番　大事な夜　一緒にいたいよ2人の夢が重なるイブに…駅の前　一本のもみの木に粉雪が舞い降りて来た電飾が(電飾が)灯り始めた頃この場所に(この場所に)愛が集まって来る聖なる夜の足音に僕は感謝するとっておきMerry Christmas !(I say, You say, Merry Christmas!)僕らのMerry Christmas ! Holy night !キャンドル見つめながら　永遠　誓い合う未来もずっと一緒にいたいよ恋人や(恋人や)友達や家族と大切な(大切な)待ち合わせがいっぱい愛する人の笑顔を思い浮かべて…とびきりMerry Christmas !(I wish you a Merry Christmas !)素敵なMerry Christmas ! Silent night !一番　大事な夜　一緒にいたいよ2人の夢が重なるイブに…とっておきMerry Christmas !(I say, You say, Merry Christmas !)Silent night ! Holy night !とっておきMerry Christmas !(I wish you a Merry Christmas !)素敵なMerry Christmas ! Silent night !一番　大事な夜　一緒にいたいよ2人の夢が重なるイブに…1年で1番　特別な夜
translated_lyrics: aside, Merry Christmas!I wish you a Merry Christmas!Nice Merry Christmas! Silent night!♫ I want to stay with me the most important night ♫ ♫ to the two of my dreams, ♫ ♫ And I thank you for the sings of the holy night, ♫ ♫ in the footsteps of the trees ♫ ♫ in one of the trees in the front of the station. ♫ ♫ And I thank you for the sine of the sacred night. ♫ ♫ Merry Christmas! ♫(I say, You say, Merry Christmas!Merry Christmas, Our Merry Christmas! Holy night!I want to see the future of Eternity, I want to be with my friends, my friends, my friends, my family and my loved ones full of beloved ones.I wish you a Merry Christmas!Nice Merry Christmas! Silent night!I want to be the most important night with the two of my dreams, and every other day, Merry Christmas!(I say, You say, Merry Christmas!Silent night! Holy night!aside, Merry Christmas!I wish you a Merry Christmas!Nice Merry Christmas! Silent night!I want to be the most important night with the two dreams, the first special night of the year.
